title.rendered: Staff Spotlight: Yasmine Thompson, Payroll Clerk

content.rendered:
Yasmine Thompson tells us more about her role as a Payroll Clerk here at The Accountancy Partnership.

Give an overview of the duties, functions, and responsibilities of your job.

Setting up payrolls, running payrolls, contacting HMRC, and submitting pensions.

What is a typical working day like for you?

As well as all the things you’d expect like running payrolls, there are emails and calls.

What particular challenges do you regularly encounter?

At the moment lots of companies are recovering from the pandemic, so there are lots of instances of getting staff back in and working.

What are some of the biggest challenges faced by your clients?

It’s only natural that everyone needs a lot of information in the beginning, but we are always here to help.

How are you able to use your skills to solve problems for them?

Being meticulous! We’ll look into everything to help find an answer.

What is your favourite part of the job?

Every day is different, you never know what you are coming in to.

What do you like most about working for The Accountancy Partnership?

Dogs in the workplace!!

What skills do you find most useful to do your job?

Having a mathematical view.

Where’s your favourite place to visit on days off?

The woods with my dog.

Tell us about your proudest achievement.

My daughter.

How would your colleagues describe you?

Hard Work!!!!!! But loveable.

What are you reading/binge watching at the moment?

Daredevil

Who do you admire, and why?

Sounds cheesy, but my Dad for showing me how to be a strong person.

What question would you really like to answer, and what’s the answer?!

Can dogs actually understand us?? I like to think so.

 

Find out more about the services we offer by hitting the live chat button, or get an instant quote online. Interested in joining the team? Check out our recruitment page!
